meta.content: Jeopardy Archive David Clemmons Sara Holub Gail Ansheles Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7531.

td.p: David Clemmons, an 11th grade U.S. history teacher from Fort Worth, Texas
Sara Holub, a high school choir teacher from Green Bay, Wisconsin
Gail Ansheles, a kindergarten teacher from Santa Fe, New Mexico

tr.td: LESSEN PLAN
GOALS
CONCEPTS
MATERIALS
"E"VALUATION
SUMMERY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"Bacon & Butter" gives recipes that follow a ketogenic diet, one that by definition is high in fat & low in these')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "Bacon & Butter" gives recipes that follow a ketogenic diet, one that by definition is high in fat & low in these
